message:
Black Gunmen Wound 8 People Including 3 Year old Girl on Saturday, No Protests, Riots, Or Looting....

This really pisses me off! Black Lives Matter is SILENT, Liberals are SILENT, Blacks are SILENT! a Child nearly DIED from a black thug and no one gives a sh*t! 

SHARE THIS EVERYWHERE! BLM doesnt give a damn about black children!
